trigger_description: This Trigger fires every time your Misfit Shine logs sleep with a duration below the target hours you specify.
This Trigger fires every time you single press your Misfit Flash button.
This Trigger fires every time you do not achieve a daily goal you choose at the time you specify. NOTE: Updated on the first Misfit Shine sync after the time you specify.
This Trigger fires every time your Misfit Shine syncs for the first time today and your previous day's stats are available.
This Trigger fires every time you long press your Misfit Flash button.
This Trigger fires every time you double press your Misfit Flash button.
This Trigger fires every time you triple press your Misfit Flash button.
This Trigger fires every time your Misfit Shine logs sleep with a duration above the target hours you specify.
This Trigger fires every time you achieve your daily point goal.
